item.title: Comprehensive sampling of coverage effects in catalysis by leveraging generalization in neural network models
item.description:
Daniel Schwalbe‐Koda, Nitish Govindarajan, Joel B. Varley, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405193217
A combination of generalization in neural networks and fast data pipelines enables comprehensive sampling coverage and co-adsorption effects in heterogeneous catalyst models.
item.author: Daniel Schwalbe‐Koda, Nitish Govindarajan, Joel B. Varley

item.title: <sup>27</sup>Al NMR chemical shifts in zeolite MFI via machine learning acceleration of structure sampling and shift prediction.

item.author: Daniel Willimetz, Andreas Erlebach, Christopher J. Heard, Lukáš Grajciar

item.title: MatFold: systematic insights into materials discovery models’ performance through standardized cross-validation protocols
item.description:
Matthew Witman, Peter Schindler, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405203246
Machine learning (ML) models in the materials sciences that are validated by overly simplistic cross-validation (CV) protocols can yield biased performance estimates for downstream modeling or materials screening tasks. This...
item.author: Matthew Witman, Peter Schindler

item.title: Predicting Mechanical Properties of Non-Equimolar High-Entropy Carbides using Machine Learning
item.description:
Xi Zhao, Shu-guang Cheng, S. F. Yu, Jiming Zheng, Ruizhi Zhang, Meng Guo, Digital Discovery. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4405265950
High-entropy carbides (HECs) have garnered significant attention due to their unique mechanic properties. However, the design of novel HECs has been limited by extensive trial-and-error strategies, along with insufficient knowledge...
item.author: Xi Zhao, Shu-guang Cheng, S. F. Yu, Jiming Zheng, Ruizhi Zhang, Meng Guo
